comment: * Builder for creating of a {@link PrinterInfo}.

methods.name: public Builder setStatus(@Status int status)
methods.comment:
* Sets the printer status.
         *
         * @param status The status.
         * @return This builder.
         * @see PrinterInfo#STATUS_IDLE
         * @see PrinterInfo#STATUS_BUSY
         * @see PrinterInfo#STATUS_UNAVAILABLE

methods.name: public Builder setIconResourceId(@DrawableRes int iconResourceId)
methods.comment:
* Set a drawable resource as icon for this printer. If no icon is set the printer's
         * service's icon is used for the printer.
         *
         * @param iconResourceId The resource ID of the icon.
         * @return This builder.
         * @see PrinterInfo.Builder#setHasCustomPrinterIcon

methods.name: public Builder setHasCustomPrinterIcon(boolean hasCustomPrinterIcon)
methods.comment:
* Declares that the print service can load a custom per printer's icon. If both * {@link PrinterInfo.Builder#setIconResourceId} and a custom icon are set the resource icon * is shown while the custom icon loads but then the custom icon is used. If * {@link PrinterInfo.Builder#setIconResourceId} is not set the printer's service's icon is * shown while loading. *

* The icon is requested asynchronously and only when needed via * {@link android.printservice.PrinterDiscoverySession#onRequestCustomPrinterIcon}. *

* * @param hasCustomPrinterIcon If the printer has a custom icon or not. * * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setName(@NonNull String name)
methods.comment: * Sets the localized printer name which * is shown to the user * * @param name The name. * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setDescription(@NonNull String description)
methods.comment: * Sets the localized printer description * which is shown to the user * * @param description The description. * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setInfoIntent(@NonNull PendingIntent infoIntent)
methods.comment:
* Sets the {@link PendingIntent} that launches an activity showing more information about
         * the printer.
         *
         * @param infoIntent The {@link PendingIntent intent}.
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setCapabilities(@NonNull PrinterCapabilitiesInfo capabilities)
methods.comment:
* Sets the printer capabilities.
         *
         * @param capabilities The capabilities.
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public PrinterInfo build()
methods.comment:
* Creates a new {@link PrinterInfo}.
         *
         * @return A new {@link PrinterInfo}.

methods.name: public Builder incCustomPrinterIconGen()
methods.comment:
* Increments the generation number of the custom printer icon. As the {@link PrinterInfo}
         * does not match the previous one anymore, users of the {@link PrinterInfo} will reload the
         * icon if needed.
         *
         * @return This builder.
         * @hide
